relatedRecords.name: Experts Live Europe 2020
relatedRecords.description: Experts Live Europe is a Microsoft community conference focused on everything Microsoft Cloud, Datacenter, Security and Modern Workplace technologies. The conference takes place on November 20-22, 2019 in Prague, Czech Republic.

relatedRecords.name: Remote Work Summit 2020
relatedRecords.description: WORLD’S LARGEST REMOTE WORK CONFERENCE THE REMOTE WORK SUMMIT 2020 Build Your Remote - Attend Online: 14 - 16 April 2020 ​ 11,000+ Professionals Will Attend Online. Will You? Remote work (full-time work-from-home) is supposed to be the one real benefit of the internet. We got ‘TikTok’ instead. (Sic)…
